paper_abstract: The number of self-dual cyclic codes of length p (k) over GR(p (2), m) is determined by the nullity of a certain matrix M(p (k) , i (1)). With the aid of Genocchi numbers, we determine the nullity of M(p (k) , i (1)) and hence determine completely the number of such codes.
paper_title: A note on cyclic codes over GR(p(2), m) of length p(k)
